name: Improve Your Journal API
description: Time to put your AI skills to work! In this capstone, you'll revisit your Journal API from Phase 2 and improve it using everything you've learned about AI tools and prompt engineering. This isn't about adding new features—it's about making what you have better.
short_description: Apply prompt engineering and AI tool skills to improve your Phase 2 Journal API prompts and code quality.

learning_steps.description:
Open your Journal API from Phase 2. Find your LLM prompts and system messages. Ask yourself:

• Are they clear and specific?
• Do they use proper delimiters?
• Do they request structured output correctly?
• What edge cases might break them?

Write down what you find before making changes.

Using what you learned, improve your prompts:

1. Add clear delimiters around user content
2. Use few-shot examples if appropriate
3. Request structured JSON output properly
4. Add constraints (max length, format requirements)
5. Test with edge cases: empty entries, very long entries, entries with special characters

Select different parts of your code and ask Copilot Chat:

• "What could be improved about this error handling?"
• "Are there any security concerns with this code?"
• "What edge cases am I not handling?"

Implement improvements yourself based on the feedback. Don't let Copilot rewrite your code.

Update your README or add comments explaining:

• What prompt patterns you used and why
• What improvements you made based on AI feedback
• What you learned from the review process

Good documentation shows you understand your own code.

learning_steps.text: Reflect on Your AI Tool Usage
learning_steps.action: Reflect on Your AI Tool Usage:
learning_steps.description:
Write a brief reflection (can be in your README or journal):

• How did AI tools help you improve your code?
• When were you tempted to just accept AI suggestions without understanding?
• What's the difference between how you used AI in Phase 2 vs. Phase 3?
• How will you use AI tools going forward?

questions.prompt: Walk me through the improvements you made to your Journal API prompts and the reasoning behind each change.
How did your approach to using AI tools evolve between Phase 2 and Phase 3?

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you review my updated prompts and suggest further improvements?
Can you quiz me on why I made specific changes to my code?
Can you ask me to explain my prompt engineering decisions?

learning_objectives.text: Review and document current prompt quality
Apply prompt engineering patterns to improve prompts
Use Copilot Chat for code review (not rewriting)
Document changes and reflect on AI tool usage
